```{r eval=F}
library(plutus)

example_data <- plutus::exampleGCAMproj
invest <- plutus::gcamInvest(gcamdatabase = NULL,
                             queryFile = NULL,
                             reReadData = T,
                             dataProjFile = example_data,
                             gcamdataFile = NULL,
                             scenOrigNames = 'ALL',
                             scenNewNames = NULL,
                             regionsSelect = c('Colombia', 'Argentina'),
                             dirOutputs = paste(getwd(), "/outputs", sep = ""),
                             folderName = NULL,
                             nameAppend = "",
                             saveData = T)
```
